ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 161
ygData.msgSnippet: The guild should be fine, but you should be able to raise your faction, the trip to Qeynos is dangerous, and growing up in Blackburrow is almost
ygData.messageBody:
The guild should be fine, but you should be able to raise your faction, the
trip to Qeynos is dangerous, and growing up in Blackburrow is almost
counterproductive for a bard, I know from experience......, The wide open
expanse of N. Ro is soooo much easier.
-----Original Message-----
From: weya <weya@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 9:09 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 161


>From: weya <weya@...>
>
>Jaezebel,
>
>Not even with the bard guild in Qeynos?? I thought that I'd at least get
amiable
>there. Am I forever tied to the eastern side of Norrath as far as faction
rating
>goes? It's so laggy over there ... I've never had a problem hunting in
Qeynos in
>"past lives".
>
>Safe travels,
>Wynsong
>Woodelf Bard, Level 3 (and a half! ;-)
>Rivervale, Quellious
>
>
>>
>>
>> Message: 10
>> Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 12:48:12 -0400
>> From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>> Subject: Re: Rivervale to Qeynos?
>>
>> And actually he is a Wood Elf, his faction in Qeynos area will be no
better,
>>
>> Stay in Misty
>>
>> Jaezebel Moonsong
>> Gypsy Bard of the 20th Stanza
>> Innoruuk
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: weya@... <weya@...>
>> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
>> Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 9:10 AM
>> Subject: [eqbards] Rivervale to Qeynos?
>>
>> >From: weya@...
>> >
>> >Greetings,
>> >
>> >Well, I figured out how to get my songs on the hotkeys
>> >... even applied it to a magic user "sister" of mine. <s>
>> > I've been running around Rivervale, twisting my little
>> >heart out (working pretty good I think) and killing
>> >everything in sight.
>> >
>> >I have one problem though ... none of the vendors like
>> >me. Any npc that will sell to me looks at me
>> >"apprehensively". I went to every npc I could find and
>> >found one that was disinterested ... but he wouldn't
>> >(couldn't) sell to me. So I'm making crap money on my
>> >loot. At this rate, I'm never gonna be able to even
>> >afford songs, let alone any equipment (sewing kit &
>> >patterns for example).
>> >
>> >So I need help! Either, point me to someone in Rivervale
>> >who will offer me decent prices or ... If there isn't
>> >anyone that fits that bill, then I think I need to move
>> >on to Qeynos. In that case, I need good directions from
>> >Rivervale to Qeynos. Every travel guide I've found gives
>> >the directions the opposite way around ... and they're
>> >not easily reversed.
>> >
>> >Thanks again,
>> >Wynsong
>> >Woodelf Bard, Level 3
>> >Rivervale, Qeynos
>
>--
